dmca.title: Mesotheliomaweb complains of metastasizing text (3)
dmca.body:
Sir/Madam:

I write to complain about the website bestmesotheliomalawyers.com and to ask that this site be removed from Google's search index. It infringes on the copyright owned by The David Law Firm, P.C.

This site copies several pages of our website http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/


http://www.bestmesotheliomalawyers.com/ is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm

http://www.bestmesotheliomalawyers.com/mesothelioma.htm is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org

http://www.bestmesotheliomalawyers.com/findspc.htm is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/tindspc.htm


http://www.bestmesotheliomalawyers.com/clinical.htm is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/clinical.htm


http://www.bestmesotheliomalawyers.com/peace.htm is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/peace.htm


http://www.bestmesotheliomalawyers.com/sponsorship.htm states that the site is sponsored by The David Law Firm, P.C., but it is not.

This site is listed in the Google search index. A search for "bestmesotheliomalawyers.com" brings it up.
 
According to whois information at the registrar NameCheap.com, bestmesotheliomalawyers.com is registered to:

[private] ([private]@aol.com) +1.[private]
Fax: +1.[private]
[private]
Oxford, AL 36203
US

I sent a letter to this site's ISP a couple weeks ago, but it is still up.
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

My e-mail address is [private]@sitecoach.com You can also reach me at

The David Law Firm, P.C. [private] Austin, TX 78746
(512) [private]
Sincerely,
 
Daniel Crean
The David Law Firm
